summary: This mod is a conversion of newwogudnew's lich queen armor to the CHSBHC body
descriptionHtml:
--------------------[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/20r7a0k.jpg[/IMG]--------------------
[URL=http://tinypic.com/m/i1wscn/4]View My Video[/URL]
For anyone who downloads this, the folder "armor" is misspelled as "amor". Just renamed it "armor".
--------------------[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2rgm8ti.jpg[/IMG]--------------------

This mod is a conversion of newwogudnew's lich queen armor to the CHSBHC body.The armor can be crafted at the forging station under dragone section.light armor, heavy armor.

--------------------[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/28mnzb5.jpg[/IMG]--------------------

-XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32
HDT heels system

--------------------[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2hpskkp.jpg[/IMG]--------------------

Thanks to Bethesda for an amazing game
Thanks to The Nexus for hosting this mod
Thanks to adec lich queen armor by newwogudnew
